name: All About Lois Griffin Quiz | Family Guy | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where did Lois plan to hold Stewie's first birthday party?
questions.explanation:
Cheesy Charlie's.

	To reserve the birthday party, Lois had to book the reservation on the day of her ultrasound.  Peter cancels the reservation.

questions.text: What instrument does Lois play and teach?
questions.explanation:
Piano.

	Lois is a piano teacher and player.  Through many episodes, she is seen teaching many students, including Peter at one point.

questions.text: When Lois plays the slots at an Indian Casino in "The Son Also Draws", she loses money and what else?
questions.explanation:
The car.

	While gambling, she loses the car, and Peter has to go on a "Spiritual Journey".  He earns back the car from the Indians who run the casino.

questions.text: Name the manor which Lois and the family inheirit from Lois's Aunt Marguerite.
questions.explanation:
Cherrywood Manor.

	The song which the staff of the manor sing when the Griffins arrive at the manor, "This House is Freakin' Sweet" was nominated for an Emmy Award.

questions.text: What play does Lois try to recreate after she becomes president of the Quahog Theatre Club when Robert Kimble dies?
questions.explanation:
The King and I.

	After appointing Peter as the producer, Lois has to back out of the show because Peter keeps ruining Lois's play.  The show is eventually called "Peter Griffin Presents a Peter Griffin Production of 'The King and I';  A Peter Griffin Production".

questions.text: Lois runs against Peter in an election for what position?
questions.explanation:
School Board President.

	Lois runs unopposed after her running mate drops out of the election.  Peter steps in after one of his teachers is being fired, and he wins after showing a sexy picture of Lois to the town.  Peter has to drop out as president when the kids at school all have Peter's pornographic magazines.

questions.text: Who is the rival piano teacher to Lois Griffin in "Wasted Talent"?
questions.explanation:
Alexis.

	In the piano competition, Lois beats Alexis by using Peter.  When Peter is drunk he is an awesome piano player, and during the competition, he plays the "Mary Tyler Moore Show" theme song.

questions.text: What British neighbour moves next door to the Griffins and has a crush on Lois?
questions.explanation:
Nigel & Nigel Pinchley & Pinchley.

	Nigel Pinchley and his 3-year-old daughter supposedly leave Quahog after this episode as they are never seen again.  Nigel opens a British Pub in Quahog after The Drunken Clam is closed down.  The Drunken Clam is bought back at the end of the episode.

questions.text: Lois learns Tae-Jitsu and beats up people from what state in "Lethal Weapons"?
questions.explanation:
New York.

	The New Yorkers head to Quahog every fall to view the changing leaves.  Soon, New Yorkers or "Leafers" are on people's lawns and yards viewing the leaves while trespassing.  Lois ends up beating up many people.

questions.text: What superpower does Lois possess in the "Family Guy Viewer Mail" short entitled "Super-Griffins"?
questions.explanation:
Super-strength.

	Lois has super-strength, Peter shape-shifts, Brian has super speed, Meg can grow claws, Stewie has mind control, and Chris is pyrokinetic.  Obviously, these are not permanent as this is just a "vignette show" (like "Treehouse of Horror" on "The Simpsons").
